Controller
Class Controller, a general graphic interface controller
CustomerController
Class CustomerController, which controls a customer view
CustomerSignInController
Class CustomerSignInController, which controls customer sign-in interface
DataAccess
Class DataAccess, which supplies several type of method to retrieve data from the database wineshop (this class prevents SQL injection attacks)
EmployeeAssesmentBox
Class EmployeeAssesmentBox IS-A Group which represent graphically employees' assesments
LoginController
Class LoginController, which control the login interface
ModelTesting
 
Outcome
Enum Outcome, which represents different Outcome ( Success, Error, Insufficient_Privileges)
Purchase
Class Purchase, which represent a purchase (purchase order, purchase proposal, sales order)
PurchaseBox
Class PurchaseBox IS-A Group which graphically represent a purchase
PurchaseProposalBox
Class PurchaseProposalBox IS-A PurchaseBox which graphically represent a purchase proposal
PurchaseType
Enum PurchaseType, which represents different Purchase Type
Report
Class Report, which represent a monthly report of an employee
SalesOrderBox
Class SalesOrderBox IS-A PurchaseBox which graphically represent a sales order
Server
Class Server, the Main Server of the application
ServerThread
Class ServerThread, which represents a wineshop's server child that handle requests
Service
Class Service, which represent a supplier or a courier
User
Class User, which represent information about a user
Utilities
Class Utilities, which contains useful functions in all views
WindowApplication
Class WindowApplication, from which the client application starts
Wine
Class Wine, which represent a kind of wine

Class WineBox IS-A Group which graphically represent a wine to buy
